awtrix settings
Sleep (manually)
info:
You can change the node to a specific time.
Please consider that the device should be
plugged in to power for longer sleep times, eg.
over night.

See "awtrix sleep" node for changing amount
of sleep time.

To set the values click the button of below
node.

Visit the AWTRIX website for all settings:
https://blueforcer.github.io/awtrix3/#/api

name: Readme.1st
info:
1. TeslaMate: connect TeslaMate with your mqtt server
2. AWTRIX: connect AWTRIX device with your mqtt server
3. AWTRIX: download all icons used by the flow (see below) to your AWTRIX device (see icons in settings)
4. This flow: change variable "awtrix_prefix" (see "vars" node) to the mqtt topic of your AWTRIX device (see mqtt in settings "prefix")
5. This flow: change home coordiantes (see "vars" node)
6. This flow: change mqtt server settings in node-red to your mqtt server (see right side settings icon "MQTT")

Used icons (download to AWTRIX device):
23172
2735
7421
44231
8478
2056

More icons:
https://developer.lametric.com/icons

AWTRIX settings:
awtrix_bri = '70'; // Brightness (0-255)
awtrix_abri = false; // Automatic brightness
awtrix_teff = '10'; // App transition effect
awtrix_tspeed = '800'; // App transition time
awtrix_sspeed = '50'; // Scroll speed

Show preinstalled AWTRIX apps (needs manual restart of the device after publishing):
awtrix_app_tim = true; // Show time
awtrix_app_dat = false; // Show date
awtrix_app_hum = false; // Show humidity (sensor in device)
awtrix_app_temp = false; // Show temperature (sensor in device)
awtrix_app_bat = false; // Show battery soc of device
